title: Instruction Letter For Keeping Students Information and Documents / Updating/ Preparation of the Student Documents (ISR-C210-04) | Yönerge
text: Instruction No ISR-C210-04-V03 Effective Date 28-12-2004 Update Date 20-12-2011 Related Unit / Owner SR / Öğrenci Kaynakları Direktörlüğü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Aim Scope Principle Statutory Basis Definitions / Abbreviations Regulations Related Procedures Procedure For Keeping And Updating Student Information (PSR-C210-0401) Procedure For Preparation Of Student Certificate (PSR-C210-0402) Procedure For Preparation Of Student Identification Cards (PSR-C210-0403) Procedure For Preparation Of Pass Card (PSR-C210-0404) Related Forms Related Form Links
